com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED JOB DEFINITION. CHANGES MADE USING THE ONLINE EDITOR WILL NOT BE HONORED. MAKE CHANGES TO THE JOB DEFINITIONS IN THE openshift/aos-cd-jobs REPOSITORY INSTEAD.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLUSTER_PROFILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The subdirectory of openshift/release cluster/test-deploy to use for configuration of the cluster.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The image to install the cluster with. If set, defaults to the value defined by the cluster/bin/local.sh script.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'libra' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/devenv.pem'

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FORWARD GCS CREDENTIALS TO REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FORWARD GCS CREDENTIALS TO REMOTE HOST [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi for (( i = 0; i < 10; i++ )); do if scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config /var/lib/jenkins/.config/gcloud/gcs-publisher-credentials.json openshiftdevel:/data/credentials.json; then break fi done

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod o+rw /etc/environment ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'JOB_SPEC=${JOB_SPEC:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'buildId=${buildId:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_ID=${BUILD_ID:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'REPO_OWNER=${REPO_OWNER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'REPO_NAME=${REPO_NAME:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_BASE_REF=${PULL_BASE_REF:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_BASE_SHA=${PULL_BASE_SHA:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_REFS=${PULL_REFS:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_NUMBER=${PULL_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_PULL_SHA=${PULL_PULL_SHA:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'JOB_SPEC=${JOB_SPEC:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_NUMBER=${BUILD_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'CLONEREFS_ARGS=${CLONEREFS_ARGS:-}' >> /etc/environment"

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: SYNC REPOSITORIES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: SYNC REPOSITORIES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" if [[ "\$( jq --compact-output ".buildid" <<<"\${JOB_SPEC}" )" =~ ^"[0-9]+"\$ ]]; then echo "Keeping BUILD_ID" else echo "Using BUILD_NUMBER" JOB_SPEC="\$( jq --compact-output '.buildid |= "'"\${BUILD_NUMBER}"'"' <<<"\${JOB_SPEC}" )" fi for image in 'registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/clonerefs:latest' 'registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/initupload:latest'; do for (( i = 0; i < 5; i++ )); do if docker pull "\${image}"; then break fi done done clonerefs_args=\${CLONEREFS_ARGS:-} docker run -e JOB_SPEC="\${JOB_SPEC}" -v /data:/data:z registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/clonerefs:latest --src-root=/data --log=/data/clone.json \${clonerefs_args} docker run -e JOB_SPEC="\${JOB_SPEC}" -v /data:/data:z registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/initupload:latest --clone-log=/data/clone.json --dry-run=false --gcs-bucket=origin-ci-test --gcs-credentials-file=/data/credentials.json --path-strategy=single --default-org=openshift --default-repo=origin sudo chmod -R a+rwX /data sudo chown -R origin:origin-git /data SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod o+rw /etc/environment ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'JOB_NAME=${JOB_NAME:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_NUMBER=${BUILD_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'CLUSTER_PROFILE=${CLUSTER_PROFILE:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE=${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE:-}' >> /etc/environment"

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: DETERMINE THE INSTANCE PREFIX ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: DETERMINE THE INSTANCE PREFIX [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi # date is enough for building image export INSTANCE_PREFIX=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) # write the standard variables for reuse echo "INSTANCE_PREFIX=${INSTANCE_PREFIX:-}" >> INSTANCE_PREFIX # hack around forwarding this to the other machine cat INSTANCE_PREFIX | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "cat >> /etc/environment"

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: CLONE REPOS ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: CLONE REPOS [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" git clone --branch azure_provisioning https://github.com/kwoodson/openshift-ansible.git git clone --branch azure https://github.com/pschiffe/release.git SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD OPENSHIFT INSTALLER IMAGE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD OPENSHIFT INSTALLER IMAGE [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" pushd openshift-ansible docker build -f images/installer/Dockerfile -t openshift/origin-ansible:latest . popd SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: MOVE SECRETS TO REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: MOVE SECRETS TO REMOTE HOST [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi rsync --copy-links --omit-dir-times --archive --rsh "ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config" /var/lib/jenkins/.azure/* openshiftdevel:/home/origin/release/cluster/test-deploy/${CLUSTER_PROFILE}/ ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel 'sudo chown -R origin:origin-git /home/origin/release/cluster/test-deploy/${CLUSTER_PROFILE}/' ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel 'sudo chmod -R ug+rwX /home/origin/release/cluster/test-deploy/${CLUSTER_PROFILE}/'

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD NODE IMAGE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD NODE IMAGE [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" pushd release/cluster/test-deploy/\${CLUSTER_PROFILE} TYPE=\$CLUSTER_PROFILE ../../bin/ansible.sh ansible-playbook \ -e "openshift_azure_base_image_ns=magentaciimages" \ -e "openshift_azure_image=openshift-gi-\${INSTANCE_PREFIX}" \ -e "openshift_azure_clusterid=magentaciimages" \ playbooks/\${CLUSTER_PROFILE}/openshift-cluster/build_image.yml popd SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: CLEAN UP RESOURCES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: CLEAN UP RESOURCES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" pushd release/cluster/test-deploy/\${CLUSTER_PROFILE} TYPE=\$CLUSTER_PROFILE ../../bin/ansible.sh ansible-playbook \ -e "openshift_azure_image=openshift-gi-\${INSTANCE_PREFIX}" \ -e "openshift_azure_clusterid=magentaciimages" \ playbooks/\${CLUSTER_PROFILE}/openshift-cluster/remove_instance.yml popd SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""
